summary: this Spell Can Gets you From the sky a big Fire bolt it\'s even Getting on Dragons and drag him to the floor
descriptionHtml: i actually wanted to try to do mod and i don\'t really know if that works i am really wishing it will work, the mod gotta be a Big fire bolt comes From the sky when you hold the left button it\'s gonna automtically drag the ball to you this spell can be found in river wood you need to open the secret Treasury and get down you\'ll find it on the tabel then get it and read it then start doing the Spell i wish you\'ll have fun.
author: amir
